name: Roll out from the Diengeon
description:
ROLL OUT of THE DIENGEON.

OBJECTIVE: ESCAPE

Roll Out The Diengeon is a fast-paced 2D top-down game where you play as an archaeologist who found an artifact, Golden dice. Explore the DIENGEON, and save your life from evil-will that haunt the dungeon!!!

To escape, put the correct dice in its respective altars.

  • Use W, A, S, D to move
  • Left mouse to roll dice and dash backwards.
  • Right mouse to slam dice and rekindle nearby dice's light.
  • Space to interact (take, put) with the dices.
  • Everything is dark;  keep your eyes peeled for guardians that intend to charge head-on. but don't chicken out- several close calls will rejuvenate you and your dices.
  • Dices are torch, and so are you, depending on how much faceless you hold.
  • Memorize your dices, you start with 3 faceless dice, and if you take over 6, they get cycled over.
